ASSI.MI.summary: Assiteca S.p.A. provides insurance consultancy and broking services in Italy. The company offers disaster recovery, renewable energy, directors and officers liability, health, logistics, transport, cargo, boating, and credit insurance products, as well as property damage, business interruption, theft, robbery, and general/employer's liability insurance. It also provides technical analysis of corporate risks. Assiteca S.p.A. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.
